Message: Hi, Iâ€™m the NewsBreak Ad Assistant. How can I help?
The user completes the submission of the form

I ran into an issue with my ad. When trying to submit it, under the URl pops up "Current as set tracks events with Postback, thus Landing Page URL should contain __CALLBACK_PARAM__ as macro of a parameter" I was wondering how to fix this

It looks like you need to include the __CALLBACK_PARAM__ macro in your landing page URL for your ad. This is required for tracking events with Postback. Here's how you can fix it:
1. Add the Callback Parameter to Your Ad's Landing Page URL by inserting "__CALLBACK_PARAM__" into the landing page URL of your ad.
For more detailed instructions, you can refer to this article: [How to integrate a general NewsBreak Postback](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25226963388813-How-to-integrate-a-general-NewsBreak-Postback).
